knimeNode.name: Regression
knimeNode.shortDescription: Perform Regression for one selected variable

fullDescription.intro: This node performs a regression on the selected target variable using the selected independent variables. Depending on the choosen distribution of the target variables linear/logistic/... regression is performed.
fullDescription.option: Choose (dependent) target variable for which the regression shall be performed
Choose the family of the target variable (cf. glm in R)
Choose Independent Variables used for each regression

ports.inPort: Data with variables in the columns and samples in the rows
ports.outPort: Table which shoes the coefficients (betas, p-values,...) for the performed regression
Table which contains residuals, predictors, fitted values, effects and weights of all samples

views.view: STDOUT and STDERR of the according R process
